metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3902 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Mercurial before 4.9. It was possible to use symlinksand subrepositories to defeat Mercurial's path-checking logic and writefiles outside a repository.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3902` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 4.5.3-1ubuntu2.2
mercurial-common - 4.5.3-1ubuntu2.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mercurial package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.5.3-1ubuntu2.2').
